name: BadAdvice
0:
”Alexa, give me advice”
”Give me bad advice”
”I need advice”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: give me advice
des:
Everyone needs advice from time to time, and with Bad Advice getting it is as easy as 1,2,3! 

1) Laugh

2) Ponder

3) Repeat

30+ hilarious tidbits of bad advice delivered straight to your ear via Alexa, your personal confidant and life coach.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
